symjax.tensor.pdfs¶

Multivariate Normal¶

class multivariate_normal[source]¶
logpdf(mean, cov)[source]¶

Log of the multivariate normal probability density function.

Parameters

x (array_like) –

Returns

pdf – Log of the probability density function evaluated at x

Return type

ndarray

pdf(mean, cov)[source]¶

Multivariate normal probability density function. :param x: Quantiles, with the last axis of x denoting the components. :type x: array_like

Returns

pdf – Probability density function evaluated at x

Return type

ndarray
